world.entity.ship

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.entity.Entity
      • world.entity.ship.Ship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShip

    public class Ship
extends Entity
implements IShip
    A class of ships involving its position, velocity, direction, speed limit and shape.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Tom Sydney Kerckhove & Xavier Goas Aguililla
    Invariant:
    The thruster of a ship is a valid thruster
        canHaveAsThruster(getThruster)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship(Direction direction,
    Position position,
    double speedLimit,
    Velocity velocity,
    CircleShape shape,
    Mass mass)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
            java.lang.NullPointerException
        Initializes this new ship with a given direction, position, shape, mass, speed limit and velocity.
        Parameters:
        direction - The given direction.
        position - The given position.
        speedLimit - The given speed limit.
        velocity - The given velocity
        shape - The given circle shape
        mass - The given mass
        Effects:
      • The direction of this ship is set to the given direction.
            setDirection(direction)
      • The position of this ship is set to the given position.
            setPosition(position)
      • The speed limit of this ship is set to the given speed limit.
            setSpeedLimit(speedLimit)
      • The velocity of this ship is set to the given velocity.
            setVelocity(velocity)
      • The circle shape of this ship is set to the given circle shape.
            this.shape = shape
      • The mass of this ship is set to the given mass.
            setMass(mass)
        • Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN]
            The given shape is not a legal shape.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - [CAN]
            Any of the parameters is null.

      • Ship

        public Ship()
        Initializes this new ship with default values.
        Effect:
        Initializes this new ship with the extended ship constructor and default values.
            this(new Direction(),new Position(),Velocity.getSpeedOfLight(),new Velocity(), new CircleShape(40), new Mass(5E15))

      • fire

        public void fire()
        A method for firing a bullet from this ship.
        Effect:
        Creates a new Bullet object in the World to which this Ship belongs; the bullet also creates recoil.
            getWorld().add(new Bullet(this)) && getVelocity() = getVelocity() - bullet.getVelocity() * (bullet.mass / ship.mass)

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(Asteroid that)
        Has this Ship collide with the given Asteroid.
        Overrides:
        collideWith in class Entity
        Parameters:
        that - The given Asteroid to collide with.
        Effect:
        terminates the given bullet.
            this.terminate()

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(Bullet that)
        Has this Ship collide with the given Bullet.
        Overrides:
        collideWith in class Entity
        Parameters:
        that - The given Bullet to collide with.
        Effect:
        If this ship shot the given bullet or the bullet is null, don't do anything. Otherwise Terminate both this Ship and the given bullet.
            if (that != null && shooter != this) that.terminate() && this.terminate()
